campaign_to_team.content:
use firewall;
UPDATE ADV_ENTITY SET TEAM_ID=${new_team_id} WHERE ID IN(${campaign_id});
campaign_to_team.rollback:
use firewall;
UPDATE ADV_ENTITY SET TEAM_ID=${old_team_id} WHERE ID IN(${campaign_id});

users_to_team.rollback:
use app_user;
DELETE FROM user_team WHERE user_id IN(${campaign_id}) AND team_id=${old_team_id};

disable_placements.rollback:
use firewall;
DELETE FROM `PLACEMENT_DISABLEMENT_LOG` where PLACEMENT_ID in(${campaign_id}) AND DISABLED_FL=0
